What is the purpose of the `getnewaddress` command in Verus?
The `getnewaddress` command returns a new VRSC address for receiving payments.

getnewaddress ( "account" ) Returns a new VRSC address for receiving payments. Arguments: 1. "account"    (string, optional) DEPRECATED. If provided, it MUST be set to the empty string "" to represent the default account. Passing any other string will result in an error. Result: "VRSC_address"  (string) The new VRSC address Examples: > verus getnewaddress > curl --user myusername --data-binary '{"jsonrpc": "1.0", "id":"curltest", "method": "getnewaddress", "params": [] }' -H 'content-type: text/plain;' http://127.0.0.1:27486/
./raw_text_input_api_text/getnewaddress
What is the optional argument for the `getnewaddress` command, and what is its purpose?

The optional argument for the `getnewaddress` command is "account". However, it is deprecated and should be set to an empty string ("") to represent the default account. Passing any other string will result in an error.

getnewaddress ( "account" ) Returns a new VRSC address for receiving payments. Arguments: 1. "account"    (string, optional) DEPRECATED. If provided, it MUST be set to the empty string "" to represent the default account. Passing any other string will result in an error. Result: "VRSC_address"  (string) The new VRSC address Examples: > verus getnewaddress > curl --user myusername --data-binary '{"jsonrpc": "1.0", "id":"curltest", "method": "getnewaddress", "params": [] }' -H 'content-type: text/plain;' http://127.0.0.1:27486/

How can I use the `getnewaddress` command to generate a new VRSC address using the command line?

You can use the `getnewaddress` command to generate a new VRSC address by running the following command:
```
verus getnewaddress
```
Alternatively, you can use the Verus RPC interface to generate a new address by sending a JSON-RPC request to the Verus server. For example:
```
curl --user myusername --data-binary '{"jsonrpc": "1.0", "id":"curltest", "method": "getnewaddress", "params": [] }' -H 'content-type: text/plain;' http://127.0.0.1:27486/
```

getnewaddress ( "account" ) Returns a new VRSC address for receiving payments. Arguments: 1. "account"    (string, optional) DEPRECATED. If provided, it MUST be set to the empty string "" to represent the default account. Passing any other string will result in an error.
